story.title: Ebb of Shadows
story.text:
In a serene coastal village, an unexplained affliction has spread, leaving residents plagued by confusion, strange behaviors, and haunting gaps in their memories. The once-thriving community is now shrouded in fear as the source of the mysterious illness remains unknown.
As a determined investigator, you must delve into the lives of the villagers, exploring their stories, deciphering cryptic patterns, and uncovering hidden connections. With time running out and the mystery deepening, you’ll need all your wits to uncover the truth and bring light to the darkness engulfing the village.
The ebb and flow of secrets guide your way—will you uncover the shadows or lose yourself in them?

puzzles.title: Roadmap
puzzles.text: Outbreak investigations are like solving a complex puzzle where each piece represents a critical clue. A systematic approach should be followed to uncover the source of an illness.
hints: It's the right ingredients, but in the wrong order!-Sheldon Cooper

puzzles.title: Shredded documents
puzzles.text:
Upon inputting the sequence, you see a four-digit code reveal itself: 3124. Not knowing how to proceed with these numbers, you decide to just write it down and look around in the room.
At a corner of the room, you find a colorful crossword puzzle.
hints: The rainbow you see is unique to your position. The angle of light hitting water droplets creates your personal rainbow, different from what someone else standing nearby might see.
